entry.value: #library required for the interactive volcano plot%%00010library(plotly)%%00010%%00010#data input as a dataframe%%00010frame <- as.data.frame(knime.in, stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %%00010%%00010frame$logFC <- knime.in[,1]%%00010frame$pvalue <- knime.in[,2]%%00010frame$protein_names <- knime.in[,3]%%00010frame$protein_names_char <- as.character(frame$protein_names)%%00010%%00010# specific proteins to be labeled%%00010if (knime.flow.in[["spec_proteins"]] == "") {%%00010a <- " "%%00010NA_proteins_count <- 0%%00010} else {%%00010%%00010# gets names of specific proteins to be labeled%%00010spec_prot <- trimws(strsplit(knime.flow.in[["spec_proteins"]],',')[[1]])%%00010list <- strsplit(knime.flow.in[["spec_proteins"]],',')%%00010%%00009%%00010# creates empty dataframe, where user-provided hits will be%%00010sp_prot <- as.data.frame(matrix(data=NA, nrow=length(spec_prot), ncol= 3))%%00010%%00010# uses colnames of frame dataset%%00010colnames(sp_prot) <- colnames(frame)[4:6]%%00010%%00010# grep rows where the majority proteins are and appends them to the newly created dataframe%%00010for (i in 1:length(spec_prot)) {%%00010%%00009pom <- grep(spec_prot[i], frame$protein_names_char)%%00010%%00009sp_prot[i,] <- frame[pom, c(4,5,7)]%%00010}%%00010%%00010# checking if user provided reasonable proteins to be labeled (ie they have a valid logFC and pvalue)%%00010# if they have valid logFC and pvalue, they're placed to valid_proteins dataframe%%00010# if not, they are placed to NA_proteins dataframe%%00010sp_prot$row_sums <- rowSums(sp_prot[,1:2])%%00010NA_proteins <- sp_prot[is.na(sp_prot$row_sums),]%%00010valid_proteins <- sp_prot[!is.na(sp_prot$row_sums),]%%00010%%00010# numbers of particular cases (ie valid and NA proteins)%%00010NA_proteins_count <- nrow(NA_proteins)%%00010valid_proteins_count <- nrow(valid_proteins)%%00010%%00010# arrows to user specified proteins%%00010a <- list()%%00010if (valid_proteins_count>0){ %%00010for (i in 1:nrow(valid_proteins)) {%%00010 m <- valid_proteins[i, ]%%00010 a[[i]] <- list(%%00010 x = m[["logFC"]],%%00010 y = -log10(m[["pvalue"]]),%%00010 text = m[["protein_names"]],%%00010 xref = "x",%%00010 yref = "y",%%00010 showarrow = TRUE,%%00010 arrowhead = 0.5,%%00010 ax = 20,%%00010 ay = -40%%00010 )%%00010}%%00010} else {%%00010%%00009showarrow = FALSE%%00010%%00009}%%00010}%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010#NA values removal%%00010frame <- na.omit(frame)%%00010%%00010#zero p value replacement%%00010frame[(frame$pvalue == 0)] <- knime.flow.in[["zero_replacement"]]%%00010%%00010###################################### Interactive volcano plot ##########################################%%00010%%00010# add a grouping column, default value is "non-significant" (ie pvalue >0.05, logFC >1.5)%%00010frame["group"] <- "Non sign."%%00010%%00010# p value is significant when <0.05, logFC set by default >1.5%%00010# change the grouping if pvalue <0.05, but logFC <1.5%%00010frame[which(frame[knime.flow.in[["p_value_column"]]]< (knime.flow.in[["p_value_threshold"]]) & abs(frame[knime.flow.in[["logFC_column"]]]) < (knime.flow.in[["logFC_threshold"]]) ), "group"] <- "Significant"%%00010%%00010# change the grouping if logFC >1.5, but pvalue >0.05%%00010frame[which(frame[knime.flow.in[["p_value_column"]]]> (knime.flow.in[["p_value_threshold"]]) & abs(frame[knime.flow.in[["logFC_column"]]]) > (knime.flow.in[["logFC_threshold"]]) ), "group"] <- "FoldChange"%%00010%%00010# change the grouping if pvalue <0.05 AND logFC >1.5%%00010frame[which(frame[knime.flow.in[["p_value_column"]]]< (knime.flow.in[["p_value_threshold"]]) & abs(frame[knime.flow.in[["logFC_column"]]]) > (knime.flow.in[["logFC_threshold"]]) ), "group"] <- "Significant&FoldChange"%%00010%%00010frame_ns <- frame[frame$group == "Non sign.",]%%00010frame_sign <- frame[frame$group == "Significant",]%%00010frame_fc <- frame[frame$group == "FoldChange",]%%00010frame_sign_fc <- frame[frame$group == "Significant&FoldChange",]%%00010%%00010# plotting the volcano plot%%00010# first trace is only for displaying the number of cases used for the volcano plot%%00010# for each category there is a separate trace%%00010pom <- knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]]%%00010%%00010knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]] <- plot_ly(type = 'scatter', mode = 'markers') %>% %%00010 add_trace(%%00010 data = frame,%%00010 x = frame$logFC, %%00010 y = -log10(frame$pvalue),%%00010 name = ~ paste('Number of displayed cases: ', nrow(frame), sep=""),%%00010 marker = list(%%00010 color = 'white',%%00010 size = 4,%%00010 opacity = 1%%00010 ) %%00010 ) %>%%%00010 add_trace(%%00010 data = frame_ns,%%00010 x = frame_ns$logFC, %%00010 y = -log10(frame_ns$pvalue),%%00010 text = ~ frame_ns$protein_names_char,%%00010 name = ~ paste('Non. sign (', nrow(frame_ns), ')', sep=""), %%00010 marker = list(%%00010 color = 'coral',%%00010 size = 4,%%00010 opacity = 0.6%%00010 )) %>%%%00010 add_trace(%%00010 data = frame_sign,%%00010 x = frame_sign$logFC, %%00010 y = -log10(frame_sign$pvalue),%%00010 text = ~ frame_sign$protein_names_char,%%00010 name = ~ paste('Significant (', nrow(frame_sign), ')', sep=""), %%00010 marker = list(%%00010 color = 'darkcyan',%%00010 size = 4,%%00010 opacity = 0.6%%00010 )) %>%%%00010 add_trace(%%00010 data = frame_fc,%%00010 x = frame_fc$logFC, %%00010 y = -log10(frame_fc$pvalue),%%00010 text = ~ frame_fc$protein_names_char,%%00010 name = ~ paste('FoldChange (', nrow(frame_fc), ')', sep=""), %%00010 marker = list(%%00010 color = 'blue',%%00010 size = 4,%%00010 opacity = 0.6%%00010 )) %>%%%00010 add_trace(%%00010 data = frame_sign_fc,%%00010 x = frame_sign_fc$logFC, %%00010 y = -log10(frame_sign_fc$pvalue),%%00010 text = ~ frame_sign_fc$protein_names_char,%%00010 name = ~ paste('Significant&FoldChange (', nrow(frame_sign_fc), ')', sep=""), %%00010 marker = list(%%00010 color = 'red',%%00010 size = 4,%%00010 opacity = 0.6%%00010 )) %>%%%00010 layout (title = knime.flow.in[["plot_title"]],%%00010 xaxis = list(title=knime.flow.in[["x_axis_label"]]),%%00010 yaxis = list(title=knime.flow.in[["y_axis_label"]]),%%00010 annotations = a%%00010 )%%00010if (NA_proteins_count == 0){%%00010%%00009 knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]] %%00010} else if (NA_proteins_count > 0) {%%00010 add_annotations(knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]],%%00010 x = 1, y = 0.01, text = ~paste('Number of cases to be labeled without logFC and pvalue: ', NA_proteins_count), %%00010 showarrow = F, xref='paper', yref='paper', %%00010 xanchor='right', yanchor='auto', xshift=0, yshift=0,%%00010 font=list(size=8, color="black")) %%00010}%%00010%%00010# plot saving%%00010# checks if user provided .html or not, if not, it will automatically append it to the name of file-to-be-saved%%00010if (grepl(".html", pom, fixed=TRUE) == TRUE) {%%00010 %%00009f1 <- paste(knime.flow.in[["plot_path"]],pom, sep="", collapse = NULL)%%00010} else {%%00010%%00009f <- paste(pom,".html", sep="",collapse = NULL)%%00010%%00009f1 <- paste(knime.flow.in[["plot_path"]],f, sep="", collapse = NULL)%%00010}%%00010%%00010htmlwidgets::saveWidget(as.widget(knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]]), f1, selfcontained=FALSE)%%00010%%00010############################## Static volcano plot for output ###################################%%00010frame_output <- with(frame, plot(frame$logFC, -log10(frame$pvalue), pch=20, main="Volcano plot", xlim=c(-6,8), xlab = "log fold change", ylab = "-log10(pvalue)"))%%00010%%00010# output%%00010knime.out <- frame_output%%00010

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
